claw.wani.transformation

Class ClawTransformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • claw.shenron.transformation.Transformation
      • claw.wani.transformation.ClawTransformation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArrayToFctCall, DirectivePrimitive, IfExtract, Kcaching, LoopExtraction, LoopFusion, LoopInterchange, OpenAccContinuation, Parallelize, ParallelizeForward, XcodeMLWorkaround

    public abstract class ClawTransformation
extends Transformation
    A Transformation is an object capable of analyzing a possible code transformation to be applied and the steps to apply it to the intermediate representation. Normally, only derived classes of Transformation should be applied as the base class does not implement the core methods.
    Author:
    clementval
